GeneDef.label: fortress
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are able to fortify themselves further for a while. During this time their movement is reduced greatly and they become immune to most attacks, with the buff and debuff gradually fading over time.

GeneDef.label: beelzebub
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can absorb the power from a corpse to gain permanent buffs based on the type and size of the corpse.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Absorbing a mechanoid gives ever-evolving (foodless) progress.
Absorbing an insectoid gives ever-evolving (lethality) progress.
Absorbing an entity gives ever-evolving (lethality) progress.
Absorbing anything else gives ever-evolving (enlightenment) progress.

GeneDef.label: regenerator
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can activate a regeneration effect that enhances their healing even further. This will gradually wear off over the span of two hours.

GeneDef.label: hack mechanoid
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can quickly hack any mechanoid that they can touch, forcing it to turn violent against everything in the area, a feat that makes the pawn fall unconscious for some time.

GeneDef.label: seer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can utilize their enhanced senses to predict what other beings around them will do with extreme accuracy. This allows them to deflect most attacks that come their way for a few hours, though this requires significant concentration on their part.

GeneDef.label: beguiler
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can use a burst of persuasiveness to beguile a hostile pawn, causing it to go berserk and attack everything around it.

GeneDef.label: snapshot
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can call on their subconscious to guide them on their next several shots. These shots have a negligable chance to miss, and the time between shots is greatly shortened.

GeneDef.label: sprinter
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can push their speed to physics-defying levels for a couple hours. During this time, they will be almost impossible to injure, will be completely unaffected by terrain, and their melee blows will travel so quickly they are nigh-impossible to dodge and deal devastating amounts of damage.

GeneDef.label: titan strength
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene increase their strength considerably for an hour. During that hour, every melee blow they land will deal massive amounts of damage, most likely destroying anything in their path.
